name: @entur/create-offer-configurations-from-offer-to-buy
description: Create an array of offer configurations exactly as prescribed by the possibleTravellerIds field in an OfferToBuy
author: Eirik Vageskar <eirik.vageskar@knowit.no>

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:commonjs: tsc --module commonjs --target es5 --outDir dist/commonjs && mv dist/commonjs/index.js dist/commonjs/index.cjs
scripts.update-types: npx swagger-typescript-api --path https://api.staging.entur.io/sales/v1/offers/api-docs/swagger.json --output source/types  -n offersTypes.ts --no-client && npx swagger-typescript-api --path https://api.staging.entur.io/offers/v2-beta/api-docs/swagger.json --output source/types  -n offers2Types.ts --no-client && npx swagger-typescript-api --path https://api.staging.entur.io/api-docs/reserve-offer?group=public --output source/types  -n reserveOfferTypes.ts --no-client
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test
